attributes.action: Prevent a further erosion of privacy in the name of big business and not force ISPs to monitor YOUR data for specific traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government wants to monitor your internet usage via ISPs and potentially get you disconnected if they suspect you of doing something illegal, even when your actions could be legal, indiscrimate monitoring should not be allowed. This petition does not advocate piracy, it merely seeks to not have your rights infringed by the legislature on behalf of a large business with a broken business model.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
